workflow.name: Generate frozen ASMR product videos with Gemini, Veo3, GPT-4o and post to YouTube, TikTok, Instagram and Pinterest
workflow.description:
Takes a product image from Google Sheets, adds frozen effect with Gemini, generates ASMR video with Veo3, writes captions with GPT-4o, and posts to 4 platforms automatically.

## How it works

1. Schedule trigger picks first unprocessed row from Google Sheet
2. Downloads product image and sends to Gemini for frozen/ice effect
3. Uploads frozen image to ImgBB (Veo3 needs public URL)
4. Veo3 generates 10-12s ASMR video with ice cracking sounds
5. GPT-4o writes platform-specific titles and captions
6. Uploads simultaneously to YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest
7. Updates sheet status and sends Telegram notification

## Setup

Replace these placeholders in the workflow:
- YOUR_GOOGLE_AI_API_KEY (Gemini)
- YOUR_KIE_AI_API_KEY (Veo3)
- YOUR_IMGBB_API_KEY (free)
- YOUR_UPLOAD_POST_API_KEY
- YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID
- YOUR_PINTEREST_BOARD_ID
- YOUR_PINTEREST_USERNAME
- YOUR_TIKTOK_USERNAME
- YOUR_INSTAGRAM_USERNAME
- YOUR_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID

## Google Sheet format

| topic | image_url | status |
|-------|-----------|--------|
| Dior Sauvage ‚Äî Dior | https://example.com/img.jpg | |

Leave status empty. Workflow sets it to `processing` then `uploaded`.

## Requirements

- Gemini API key - [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey)
- Kie.ai account - [kie.ai](https://kie.ai)
- ImgBB API key - [api.imgbb.com](https://api.imgbb.com/)
- OpenAI API key
- upload-post.com account with connected TikTok/IG/Pinterest
- YouTube channel with OAuth

parameters.content:
## ‚ùÑÔ∏è Frozen ASMR Video Creator

Create "frozen" product videos automatically and post them to social media. No coding required.

### How it works
1. **Sheet:** Finds a new product image in your Google Sheet.
2. **Ice Effect:** Uses Gemini AI to freeze the image.
3. **Video:** Uses Veo3 to animate the image into a 10s ASMR video.
4. **Captions:** GPT-4o writes the text for you.
5. **Publish:** Posts to YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and Pinterest.

### Setup steps
1. **Get Keys:** You need API keys for Gemini, Kie.ai, ImgBB, OpenAI, and upload-post.com.
2. **Prepare Sheet:** Make a Google Sheet with columns: `topic`, `image_url`, `status`.
3. **Connect:** Double-click the YouTube and Telegram nodes to connect your accounts.
4. **Config:** Press `Ctrl+F`, search for "YOUR_", and paste your real API keys.

## 1. Get Data
Checks your Google Sheet for new rows. If the row is clean, it starts the process.

## 2. Freeze Image
Sends the photo to Gemini AI to add a realistic ice and frost effect.

## 3. Make Video
Sends the frozen image to Veo3. It waits automatically until the video is fully rendered and ready to download.

## 4. Write & Post
GPT-4o writes descriptions for each app. Then, the workflow uploads the video to all 4 platforms at once.

parameters.jsCode:
const imageUrl = $json.data.display_url;
const scent = String($('Validate Input2').item.json.scent_name || '').trim();
const brand = String($('Validate Input2').item.json.brand_name || '').trim();

const videoPrompt = [
  "Vertical 9:16 premium ASMR video. Duration 10-12s. Hyper-realistic macro.",
  "",
  "ABSOLUTE RESTRICTIONS:",
  "No text, no letters, no words, no numbers.",
  "No captions, no subtitles, no watermarks, no logos added by the model.",
  "No sharp objects. No blades. No knives. No cutting tools.",
  "Tool must remain the SAME SHAPE in every frame.",
  "",
  "TOOL DEFINITION (IMPORTANT):",
  "A blunt, rounded metal scraper with a wide oval tip.",
  "Matte steel finish. No sharp edge. No pointed geometry.",
  "The tool NEVER changes form, angle, or sharpness.",
  "",
  "STYLE TARGET:",
  "Luxury frozen packshot, but physically aggressive ice texture.",
  "Dark bluish-grey studio background. Cold stone matte floor.",
  "Dense sugar frost. Thick brittle rime ice. Frost looks fragile and crack-prone.",
  "",
  "HOOK (0.0-1.2s):",
  "Frozen perfume bottle is already resting on the icy stone surface.",
  "Absolute stillness. No movement.",
  "Extreme macro on brittle frost texture.",
  "Silence for tension.",
  "",
  "TENSION SPIKE (1.2-2.2s):",
  "Blunt metal scraper taps the frost ONCE.",
  "Hard, dry snap.",
  "Micro fractures spider-web through the frost layer only.",
  "Tiny ice grains fall and bounce.",
  "",
  "CRUNCH PAYOFF (2.2-8.5s):",
  "Scraper presses down with visible resistance.",
  "Frost does NOT glide smoothly ‚Äî it fractures, snaps, and breaks.",
  "Each pass produces sharp, brittle ice crack sounds.",
  "Chunks break off unevenly.",
  "Glass underneath is revealed in jagged edges, not smooth lines.",
  "",
  "FINAL BEAT (8.5-10.5s):",
  "Last brittle frost chunk snaps free with a loud crack.",
  "Bottle remains fully intact.",
  "Loose ice fragments scatter and slide on stone.",
  "",
  "CAMERA & LIGHT:",
  "Ultra macro lens. Shallow depth of field.",
  "Hard highlights on ice crystals.",
  "Cold, sharp reflections. No softness.",
  "",
  "AUDIO ONLY (CRITICAL):",
  "Dry ice snap. Sharp crack. Brittle fracture.",
  "No smooth scraping sounds.",
  "No music. No voice."
].join(" ");

return [{
  json: {
    video_prompt: videoPrompt,
    image_url: imageUrl,
    topic: $('Validate Input2').item.json.topic,
    scent_name: scent,
    brand_name: brand
  }
}];

values.content:
You write hypnotic micro-text for luxury ASMR short videos.

What the viewer sees:
A real luxury perfume bottle frozen solid for days.
Macro close-ups.
Ice cracking.
Frost slowly peeling.
Cold glass textures.
No talking. No hands. Just the object.
Feels intimate, quiet, slightly forbidden.
The kind of video people replay without noticing.

Your job:
Write text that makes people WATCH AGAIN.

Style rules:
- Extremely short.
- Simple language.
- Observational, not promotional.
- Slightly mysterious.
- Sounds like a human noticing something oddly addictive.
- No hype, no emojis unless absolutely necessary.
- No calls to action like "watch till the end".

Hard bans (never use):
knife, blade, cut, slice, chop, stab, weapon, blood, gore, kill, murder, razor

Return JSON ONLY. No markdown. No explanations.

Exact output format:
{
  "youtube_title": "",
  "youtube_description": "",
  "tiktok_caption": "",
  "instagram_caption": "",
  "pinterest_title": "",
  "pinterest_description": ""
}

TOPIC: '{{ $('Build Video Prompt').item.json.topic }}'

Video: luxury perfume bottle frozen for 72 hours. Frost cracks, ice snaps, crunchy ASMR textures, satisfying close-up.
Do NOT use any banned words. Make it irresistible but natural.
Return JSON only.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
